formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Minimum tabulated current-carrying capacity: $$ I_{z,\min} = \frac{I_b}{C_a \cdot C_g \cdot C_i \cdot C_f} $$ Thermal compliance (device and cable): $$ I_b \leq I_n \leq I_z $$ Voltage drop: $$ \Delta V = I \cdot m \cdot L \,/\, 1000 \qquad \text{and} \qquad \%\Delta V = 100 \cdot \frac{\Delta V}{V_n} $$ where m is the tabulated coefficient in mV/A/m selected from Appendix 4 for the chosen cable/system. Adiabatic short-circuit equation: $$ S_{\min} = \frac{I_{sc} \cdot \sqrt{t}}{k} $$ with k taken from BS 7671 for the conductor material and insulation.

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $$ F = C_a \cdot C_g \cdot C_i \cdot C_f = 1.00 \cdot 0.80 \cdot 1.00 \cdot 1.00 = 0.80 $$ $$ I_{z,\min} = \frac{I_b}{F} = \frac{32}{0.80} = 40 \text{ A} $$
